tweets.text: Either we are being invaded by landfill gases or we are fighting against them. And all around work & families. It‚Äôs tiring & we need it to stop @MPGeorgeEustice It‚Äôs your job to hold the @EnvAgency to account, please get this sorted @BorisJohnson @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/CE11jwtP8y

We have VERY little research into low level, long term exposure to hydrogen sulphide in the UK, yet @EnvAgency and @PHE_uk seem to want to assure us we are not at risk... please do not make false statements. More research is required https://t.co/UMoaVNnhTe

Newcastle under Lyme residents emerging from what appears to have been a major environmental incident of unprecedented proportions in this town invaded & poisoned by landfill toxic fumes from @RedIndustries2 allowed by @EnvAgency #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/ImG0xFd5uL

@EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA this is bloody ridiculous we have a full on gas onslaught again tonight from @WalleysL got serious heart palpitations again & a blinding headache. Do you care? Do you bugger üò°. Happy Mayday as it won't be for us. #StopTheStink @Cap_it_off

tweets.text:
So it begins. 
Landfill fumes in the house making me want to wretch ü§Æü§Æ
Daily sprint to switch the air purifier to max speed. 
Godspeed friends
 @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock @BorisJohnson #stopthestink https://t.co/thf7BpgQBr

@SuzVW @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA A message for the EA & PHE, we the communities of the borough Newcastle under Lyme  say NO to the acceptance of LFG in our homes, gardens, schools,  workplaces and everyday activities & way of life!
So go to the government and declare it a critical risk to health & get it sorted! https://t.co/CPE60J60V3
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency The new normal... it‚Äôs out of control https://t.co/cj3CnLdSlD

https://t.co/9vKapgSGUn tell people to email and then the email suddenly doesn't work.Something doesn't quite add up.A little like not having the monitoring stations plugged in on one of the worst weekends @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids #StopTheStink #notfitforpurpose @StinkStopthe https://t.co/qXVbNru1va

@SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @stopthestink I don‚Äôt think people outside really understand the extent of it. That this is how we live. I don‚Äôt blame them, I find it hard to believe such a situation exists in the UK in 2021. I do however blame @EnvAgency  & @RedIndustries2 for allowing it to happen #StopTheStink

4 mths ago the Stink visited us for the 1st time. 3 mths ago I rang @EnvAgency angry that I couldnt open windows at night. 2 mths ago my calls were about solid walls of gas outside my home. 1 mth ago calls to @EnvAgency were about smarting eyes, headaches, AND NOW I JUST WEEP.

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

tweets.text: @WHO @DefraGovUK @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice When are you going to stop looking the other way? This is a disaster - will you act when someone dies? @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/Hf5fO7ZLjf

@fayedavies @LoneRanger77777 @hopeternalall @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA said on the radio that they will be taking waste again in 7/10 days, it makes a mockery of what we‚Äôre truly going through, I don‚Äôt know what more we can do

@Samanth33412592 @LoneRanger77777 @hopeternalall @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA I just feel like people are getting to breaking point. I know we cannot continue to live like this. Something has to improve or NUL will be a ghost town, with those left ill and isolated #StopTheStink Clearly the system is failing us, we need to explore human rights avenues.

@EnvAgency @PHE_uk We are not being PROTECTED, we are being IGNORED. We are not being PROTECTED, we are being IGNORED. We are not being PROTECTED, we are being IGNORED. We are not being PROTECTED, we are being IGNORED. We are not being PROTECTED,we are being IGNORED.#stopthestink https://t.co/c4mzAhvgRH

The @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency seems to be more passionate about protecting big industry than the environment. Perhaps they should be called the Industry Support Agency @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/IZwaUMfQEy

Well EA what was that, level 5 and a fail!
I hope your busy officers were taking in the stinking gas polluting the borough all through the night, why don't you come out and tell the truth its beyond anyone's ability to control with huge amounts of H2S being produced!

The abundant fish in #RiverLark at #Mildenhall are most diseased &/or damaged I've ever seen. A huge amount of fin rot in the roach. Quite distressing swimming amongst such sick fish.  The river is full of gungy sediment floating down, everything covered in silt & algae. 3/3 https://t.co/CZLH7W8eHE

Landfill sites need to go, they are a widespread problem! Our friends in #Newcastleunderlyme are being subjected to the same tortuous odour! @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @daera_ni 

#airpollution #airquality #Belfast #lisburn #newcastleunderlyme #silverdale @EnvAgency https://t.co/er4meRnUeR
@HelenVi00175623 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @WalleysL @Cap_it_off Hope you‚Äôre ok Helen. This can‚Äôt be doing you any good getting palpitations xx

The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv

tweets.text: Many reasons for @MPGeorgeEustice to ensure he remains above reproach & orders a public enquiry into the regulator @EnvAgency , in particular the conduct of  @ClareDinnisEA with attention to detail to the timeline of decisions versus community concerns @Cap_it_off #StopTheStink https://t.co/lu2AhdD2oi
@Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink https://t.co/6BJamAQ7Tp

Claire Dinnis, thanks for your letter, NOT.  This is not a an odour, a slight smell we get now and again. We are being gassed. Daily. Stench/ environment emergency, Close this place down never mind being fair to them. #WalleysQuarry

@LouiseW50352472 Claire, why can a multi million pounds company inflict mental health and physical health harm and systematically disrupt life in general and make you not safe in your own home. Surely your home must be a safe place, so by logic not being safe in your own home is a failure by you!

@AaronBell4NUL What a time to be alive & struggling to breath  @ClareDinnisEA are you willing to let the bodies pile high in Newcastle under Lyme @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk when will you see the growing environment & health issues? You know this is wrong @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

tweets.text: We‚Äôve had to drive out to the country desperate for oxygen. It‚Äôs a living nightmare. Never thought I‚Äôd be driven out of my home town. It‚Äôs an environmental disaster @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency urgent action required NOW, we can‚Äôt breathe.#stopthestink https://t.co/rlWdyu4V0M

And so it starts again, just popped out to my recycler and the gas hit me like a wall, its viscous, 30mins tops before its in my house again @ClareDinnisEA. I'm 2.5 miles from this toxic health disaster. These are 1000's of lives you're ignoring @PHE_uk @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe

Judging by social media it‚Äôs another appalling evening of odour - reports from Knutton, Milehouse, Wolstanton, Basford, Porthill. üò¢ü§¢

Please keep reporting to the @EnvAgency on 0800 80 70 60 #StopTheStink

tweets.text: I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice.
